reviews.text:
Miejsce z fajnym klimatem. Obsluga tylko pozornie miÅ‚a.... zÅ‚oÅ¼yÅ‚am reklamacje mailem ale nie otrzymaÅ‚am rozwiÄ…zanie problemu jak powstal podczas wizyty. Nie polecam!
Plus za bezglutenowe jedzenie, szkoda, ze obsluga i brak rozwiazania reklamaji zmuszaja mnie do wystawienia tak niskiej oceny 1*
LANITA our server was divine. Was with us all the way! We loved her so much!
the food was great..   but my server ANITA WAS AMAZING. She was so nice and helpful...next time I will ask for her.
Ambiance qui ne ressemble pas Ã  du ROCK...
nice staff, awesome vibes, good cheap food, flowing beer and if you get a large, you get a souvenir glass. proud to be in America at this place.
I love this queen her name was lanita!!

Came on Thursday, all started great with getting a table straight away. Then had what I can only describe as a miserable server. He wasnâ€™t very interested in giving me answers when asking about the starters, size etc.
Food came, have to say very overpriced for very bland not exciting food. I get itâ€™s times square so went with it, you expect to pay more in a place like that.
However, the shocker was that due to the mediocre food and service, the bill came, I paid what I felt was deserved. How shocked was I to find the server coming back over with the bill to tell me I hadnâ€™t left a big enough tip!! Did I not understand that the suggested tips were at the bottom of the bill and had I made a mistake!! Er no, I had paid exactly what i felt was justified, even with the meal not being that great. Absolutely taken aback from the nerve of the server to say I hadnâ€™t left enough money!! Would not be back again.

I thoroughly enjoyed my experience at this iconic cafe. I canâ€™t say I enjoyed the food and the queue for coffee was too long and they ran out regularly but I wouldnâ€™t have missed the experience for the world. The memorabilia on display is so impressive and all the staff were very pleasant. My son and grandson will love the T-shirts I bought them. If you enjoy what we call in Australia â€˜Pub style foodâ€™ you will love it! ğŸ¸â¤ï¸ğŸ¸â¤ï¸ğŸ¸
Ci siamo trovati malissimo, il cameriere non era per niente professionale. Hanno fatto disastri con il conto. Non ci tornerÃ² mai piÃ¹
Great food, amazing atmosphere, friendly server.

Excellente expÃ©rience. Service rapide et trÃ¨s sympathique. EmployÃ©s souriants. La nourriture est trÃ¨s correcte et la cuisson des viandes est parfaite .hard Rock cafÃ© est toujours un endroit oÃ¹ aller partout dans le monde !
Great experience with our wonderful waitress Anna!! Definitely coming back.
This is our to-go place when traveling. The service is great and they seeve and incredible Impossible Burger!

Cameriere molto scortese e scontroso, siamo stati trattati veramente male da quel cameriere. Inoltre musica pop (che in un locale che vanta una storia rock, come per i cimeli e che espone non capisco) messa a volume altissimo che bisognava urlare tra di noi

The memorabilia in this place is just incredible. It was brilliant spending some time having a look at all of the guitars and costumes ğŸ¤© the food was delicious, especially the veggie fajitas! Jarae was a fantastic server - so attentive and really ensured we were well looked after. We were definitely in good hands this evening. Thank you!
Food & atmosphere good.  Service on arrival (greeter) was poor - beckoned over like a dog & told different things by different people...Waitress was excellent though.
front of house staff are appallingly rude, first impression completely put me off the restaurant
Easy accessible public bathroom!! The decor is top notch too
Bonne cuisine, jolie lieu, une valeur sure

Lanita is so much fun! she talked to my table for most of the time and told us jokes and riddles. she laughed with us and got us birthday desserts. best waiter ever!!
No wait to get in, seated us immediately. Good atmosphere for rock enthusiasts, lots of history. Was a good stop on our way to a Broadway show
Wonderful person. Lanita
LantÃ­a is delightful
Lanita was great!  Too loud atmosphere

Alright, but the prices are ridiculous. I understand itâ€™s time square, but Iâ€™m paying steakhouse prices for a burger, nachos and some sweets itâ€™s ridiculous. Almost $25 in liquids non alcoholic on top of my food. There should be no reason a cafe like this costs over 80$ per person for bar food. Good memories though this once since I came here in 6th, grade on a field trip, but way too overpriced, and the burgers are weird and came out cold and without cheese when I asked for it, plus I only had my nachos for under 10 minutes and they brought the burgers out which was just poor planning on their part, and the waitresses excuse was that â€œit usually takes a long time to come outâ€, which indicates a lot of internal issues at this location. I like the universal Orlando hard rock much better than this one food and service wise though, a lot nicer. Wouldnâ€™t return on a future day, but good to revisit and  reminisce.
Super Pommes
Lugar con toda la onda de los Hard Rock pero ademÃ¡s al estar en Times Square lo hace aÃºn mÃ¡s atractivo. Hay mucha variedad de souvenirs que combinan NYC con el Rock.
Good service lovely meal would recommend..x

We have been to many Hard Rock Cafes around the county.  Tonight we had exceptional service from our server Micah.  She was very personal, great listener and made our experience very nice.  Big shout out to Micah for a great job!  In additional we met the manager Elise and she was beyond awesome.  I can see why your restaurant does so well with leaders like Elise.  We wanted to pay a compliment to her regarding Micah and we found her to be exceptional as well and really made our last night in Times Square a special and memorable one.  What a great example of top customer service!  My son Ryan and I experienced a terrific experience on our last night thanks to those two!!
Nice!

Visited this place with my partner.
This place is always packed, usually a wait, but once in, the waiters are typically good with getting you situated. I'm a picky eater so I don't have many options but anyone who's not, will love this place.
Photo opp.
Tivemos uma Ã³tima experiÃªncia

We had such a great time at Hard Rock Cafe! The food was absolutely delicious â€” the ribs were tender and flavorful, and everything came out perfectly cooked. The atmosphere was lively and full of good vibes, just what you expect from Hard Rock.

A special thank you to our server, who took such wonderful care of us the entire afternoon. He was incredibly friendly, attentive, and made sure we had everything we needed with a smile. It really made the whole experience extra special.

Highly recommend this place for great food, great music, and amazing service! ğŸ¸âœ¨
Bad service and this was my â€œCappuccinoâ€
La comida deliciosa, muy bien ubicado, volverÃ­a.
Great food and really good service. Ideal location. Would recommend.
very enjoyable, delicious and museum.

Hardware Rock eben und dann noch NYC, natÃ¼rlich ein Erlebnis und eine Gelegenheit fÃ¼r eine Verschnaufpause. ABER der Mindestsatz fÃ¼r das Trinkgeld liegt bei 20% ! Das fand ich schon etwas happig. Danach folgen noch hÃ¶her SÃ¤tze. Damit nimmt das HardRock NYC meiner Meinung nach den Spitzenplatz einğŸ˜„ Wir wissen, dass Trinkgeld wichtig ist, aber es sollte auch noch gerne und freiwillig gegeben werden kÃ¶nnen.

Reserve a las 22hs del 18/OCT/2025, LleguÃ© y me atiende una seÃ±orita que me indica que pase. Voy a un salÃ³n vacÃ­o, hasta que nos damos cuenta que es en otro, vamos y nos sentamos y al rato se acerca una mesera que nos indica que nos tiene que acompaÃ±ar desde la antrada, esa que nos mandÃ³ a un salÃ³n vacÃ­o. Vamos nuevamente y nos vuelven a reubicar en una mesa en un rincÃ³n. Mucho ida y vuelta. Nos fuimos, hay mil lugares en NYC para que nos tengan de acÃ¡ para allÃ¡ en un restaurante en un su suelo. Muy mala atenciÃ³n. Muy asfixiante el lugar. No recomiendo ni intentarlo

Ich war wirklich enttÃ¤uscht. Ich hatte mich auf den klassischen Hard-Rock-Stil gefreut â€“ gute Musik, coole AtmosphÃ¤re, vielleicht etwas Nostalgie. Stattdessen lief eine merkwÃ¼rdige elektronische Musik, die Ã¼berhaupt nicht zum Konzept passt.
Der ganze Raum war dadurch irgendwie unruhig und chaotisch, die Stimmung vÃ¶llig daneben. Man hatte das GefÃ¼hl, als wÃ¼rde das ursprÃ¼ngliche Hard-Rock-Flair komplett verloren gehen.

Auch das Ambiente war dadurch â€versautâ€œ â€“ es fÃ¼hlte sich eher wie ein beliebiger Nachtclub an, nicht wie das legendÃ¤re Hard Rock CafÃ©. Sehr schade, denn die Location am Times Square hÃ¤tte so viel Potenzial.

Ich hoffe wirklich, dass man dort wieder zu den Wurzeln zurÃ¼ckfindet â€“ Rock statt Elektro!

Never got to eat, had the most miserable waiter ever... waited 20 mins to order drinks and when we did ask for something he carried on chatting to his friend... did not wanna tip this guy 20% so we left!!! Menus not great anymore either...
Such a shame as have eaten in hard rocks all over the world... this is by far the worse
Wundervoller Laden. Kommen sehr gerne wieder.

Echt gutes Essen, der Service sehr freundlich und die Ausstattung gefÃ¤llt mir sehr gut.
Einzig mit der KÃ¼hlung Ã¼bertreiben Sie es.
Lieber ein dickeren Pullover anziehen ğŸ˜€

Excellent Service from Dashawna at Hard Rock CafÃ© New York! ğŸŒŸ

We had an amazing experience thanks to our server Dashawna. She was incredibly attentive, always checking in to make sure everything was perfect, and did it all with such warmth and genuine enthusiasm.

Itâ€™s clear that she truly loves what she does â€” she was funny, friendly, and full of positive energy, which made our visit something really special.

If every restaurant had someone like her, dining out would always be a joy. Thank you, Dashawna, for making our evening so wonderful!
Great food, VERY good service. 10/10

E' la seconda volta che accompagno un gruppo di clienti a NYC, e faccio la cena di chiusura lÃ¬. Capita sempre che non possono farci mangiare insieme,questa volta abbiamo prenotato all'ultimo, ma la scorsa volta no. Comunque il personale all'ingresso, strilla ad alta voce pensando di parlare con dei ragazzini, ma i camerieri che poi servono ai tavoli ricompensano la loro arroganza ,sono molto gentili e mettono a proprio agio.  Noi siamo stati serviti da una ragazza piccolina , forse sud americana o spagnola, sempre col sorriso e gentilissima. Prossimo anno non tornerei per cena, ma solo a fare un giro per i gadget.

Itâ€™s the first time that me and my wife visited this restaurant , and itâ€™s so Disappointing OMG !!! First of all we waited more than Twenty minutes  that they will call us to get a table ticket and then five to ten minutes until some waiter will take us to some dark cornered table , when we asked to change the place ? We had to wait more time !!! And then we had some rood  waitress  !!!
So Iâ€™ll brake it one by one to you
(1) Me and my wife on a keto died so we didnâ€™t know what kind of food they serve , so we asked the waitress but apparently the waitress didnâ€™t have no patience to us at all , we told her that we are in a keto diet and what kind of food she can recommend to us , so she had no knowledge at all what we are talking about or what kind of food we can order , so she just throw to us - Look in the menu and what you see is what you get sir !!!
(2) the food that we got ? Came Surprisingly really fast after two minutes !!! We started to eat the salad and Three times in about five minutes ? my wife found human hair in the food !!! And then I paid attention that the waiters ? running to the customers taking an order , and then running to the kitchen and after two seconds coming out with the plaits full of food , are they service people with Long time maid food ? Or an old food ? Are they Recycle the food between customers ? Or they just make the food so really fast so they donâ€™t pay attention at all , if the food is full of Human hair and other kind of trash inside !!!
The taste of the food ? The shrimps smelled like some kind of disgusting smell !!! The salad was with , human hair inside !!! The Buffalo  Chicken I ordered ? was Dry like some wood !!! And The water tasted so bad taste !!!
So , I really tried to be polite and not to make Drama of it or to get upset but after my wife pulled out from her mouth human hair the third time ? I couldnâ€™t shut up anymore  and I called the shift manager , we showed him the human hair ? And he started to say to my wife maybe itâ€™s your hair in there ? OMG !!! I just almost exploded on him !!!  After a few minutes of argument ? He decided that he canâ€™t go on with it ? Because Iâ€™m not a tourist that excited to eat in Hard rock Times Square !!! Or a stupid client that will eat dirty food and pay for it Iâ€™m a New Yorker that pay attention what I eat and what I pay for !!! So he told us that we donâ€™t have to pay on the food !!!
But who wanted to eat this kind of disgusting food after so many incidents ? We just left the rest of the food on the table and left the place !!! In the next one hour that we started to eat in this restaurant ? Me and my wife also felt like throwing up , ğŸ¤¢ğŸ¤¢ğŸ¤®ğŸ¤® and felt our stomach rumbling !!!
I thought Iâ€™m gonna throw up in the middle of the ride in the train ğŸ¤¢ğŸ¤® on the way back home to Long Island !!!
Completely disappointing Restaurant !!!  ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ A Lot of show of for the tourists !!! A lot of shelves  in the entrance with employees trying to push people to buy souvenirs !!! A lots of posing in this restaurant !!! But in the and ? You get a rotten / recycled disgusting food !!! ğŸ¤®ğŸ¤®ğŸ¤®

We had such a great time at Hard Rock! Our server, Lanita, was absolutely phenomenal â€” super friendly, attentive, and made our visit so enjoyable. She checked on us often, made sure we had everything we needed, and had such a great attitude the whole time.

The food was amazing â€” we ordered wings, a burger, and a chicken sandwich, and everything was cooked perfectly. The flavors were spot on, portions were generous, and everything came out hot and fresh.

The whole experience was fun, upbeat, and full of great energy â€” exactly what you want from Hard Rock. Between the awesome food, fun atmosphere, and Lanitaâ€™s fantastic service, it was a 10/10 visit. Weâ€™ll definitely be back!

Firstly, the people who make this place what it is are amazing. The front desk staff were so polite and welcoming, setting a great tone from the moment we arrived. The venue itself is a goldmine of pleasure, filled with guitars, clothing, and memorabilia from pioneers in their respective fields â€” including notable names like The Bettles and Elvis Presley.
We were lucky to visit on a day when the restaurant was offering a retro-themed throwback menu. We enjoyed delicious crispy chips, burgers, and a classic Coke and vanilla float â€” a real treat!
However, I did have a disappointing experience in the merchandise and shop section. I had a receipt from the restaurant that offered a discount upon completing a questionnaire. Despite submitting it and being confident that all my details were correct, I never received the promised benefit or a follow-up email. The manager in that section could have been more helpful. Iâ€™d suggest revisiting this process, as it left a sour note in an otherwise fantastic visit â€” and is the reason for the missing star in my rating.
All in all, a wonderful experience that Iâ€™d definitely recommend.

NÃ£o sou super fÃ£ da comida que Ã© servida no Hard Rock, mas a visita vale a pena pelo acervo e pelas bandas que se apresentaram.

O Hard Rock Cafe em Nova York oferece uma experiÃªncia que vai alÃ©m da simples refeiÃ§Ã£o, combinando gastronomia com uma imersÃ£o na histÃ³ria e cultura do rock. Os visitantes podem esperar:
â€¢ Ambiente TemÃ¡tico: O restaurante Ã© decorado com uma vasta coleÃ§Ã£o de memorabÃ­lia do rock, incluindo figurinos, instrumentos e objetos pessoais de lendas da mÃºsica. Essa exposiÃ§Ã£o cria uma atmosfera de museu.
â€¢ Menu Americano ClÃ¡ssico: A culinÃ¡ria principal Ã© a culinÃ¡ria americana tradicional, com hambÃºrgueres icÃ´nicos, costelas, sanduÃ­ches e sobremesas, alÃ©m de um bar completo com coquetÃ©is exclusivos.
â€¢ MÃºsica e Energia: A trilha sonora Ã© de rock e pop, o que mantÃ©m a energia do local alta. A mÃºsica Ã© uma parte fundamental da experiÃªncia.
â€¢ Loja de Souvenirs: HÃ¡ uma Rock Shop onde os visitantes podem comprar camisetas, bonÃ©s e outros itens de marca para levar como lembranÃ§a.

Sinceramente mi dispiace dover fare questa recensione, ad un locale di una catena a cui sono affezionato da tanti anni.
Ho visitato almeno 40 Hard Rock CafÃ© negli Stati Uniti (incluso quello del 1998 a New York, che perÃ² era in un'altra strada), in Canada e in Italia. Questo, con nostra grande sorpresa, Ã¨ stato il peggiore: nonostante avessi chiesto che gli hamburger fossero "ben cotti", me li hanno portati poco cotti e il panino era fatto male. I piatti erano presentati male, rispetto a tutti gli altri HR. La carne dei ribs era dura! I prezzi erano estremamente alti, inclusa l'acqua islandese a 6 dollari in totale per bottiglietta da mezzo litro. Gli unici aspetti positivi erano la cortesia dei camerieri, il bel locale e la splendida posizione a Times Square

Cercavano un posto che facesse hamburger senza glutine e lo abbiamo trovato ! Hard rock fai dei panini stupendi ! Gentilissima la cameriera che ci ha servito e accontentato in ogni nostra richiesta. Bellissima esperienza, bellissimo locale.  Eccellenti i panini : la carne era gustosa .

We were able to make a reservation so seating was quick and easy. A bit disappointing that sitting in the room with the stage wasnâ€™t an option on the night we went. We sat in the room where the bar was and the music was so loud it was impossible to speak to anyone at our table. Per the hostess, there wasnâ€™t anywhere quieter to sit us (I asked as my father is hard of hearing). We all got burgers which were good. Nacho appetizer was great! Our waiter was also amazing. Gift shop on the way out was fun. Memorabilia around the restaurant is worth checking out.

It was the best burger we ever had! From the beginning, Alyssa and Danielle were really helpful and kind, they brought us to the â€œbar sectionâ€ even we had no reservation. The restaurant was full but we didnâ€™t wait too much time to start eating. We ordered 2 burger that we devoured! The fries were so crispy at the outside and so soft in the inside!
Also the bacon and the onion was crispy and flavourful and the meat was so tender.
Believe me, the best burger you can eat in NY for sure!

It offers a lively and iconic dining experience in the heart of Times Square. With its rock â€˜nâ€™ roll memorabilia, vibrant atmosphere, and friendly staff, itâ€™s a must-visit for music lovers and tourists alike. The menu features classic American fare burgers, ribs, and cocktailsâ€¦ all served in generous portions. Though it can be crowded and prices are tourist-level, the energy and entertainment value make it worth the visit

Ambiente, come sempre, vivace pieno di musica e pulito, servizio molto buono e il cibo ottimo.
Gli hamburger che fanno qua sono ottimi assieme alle lo patate spettacolari. Ma non fanno solo hamburger, hanno un ampio menu.
Abbiamo speso in 3, all'incirca 100$ tra bevande e cibo + la mancia. QualitÃ -prezzo ottima.

I sat at the bar which is where I normally prefer especially when grabbing lunch on my own. I decided to try their version of a tropical margarita since the summer is coming to an end. I tried the â€œone night in Bangkokâ€ shrimp for the appetizer which was in middle level of spicy. They had a burger world tour menu which I chose the Budapest burger (fair warning it has a ton of pulled pork on it) both were OK. The bartenders tried there best to make sure everyone was fine. They may have been short staffed since over 60% of the tables were empty yet the hostess was telling customers there was at least a half hour wait for tables & directing to the bar area. The restaurant is decorated with music memorabilia such as guitars & outfits musicians preformed with. As well a posters & such.

Es ist immer ein tolles Erlebnis in diesem Ambiente zu speisen. Die Kellner sind einfach immer toll und es passt alles.
Diesmal waren wir recht spÃ¤t dran und hatten daher kein Problem einen Tisch zu bekommen. Sonst sollte man ggf. Reservieren. Musik ist auch klasse so wie es sich gehÃ¶rt.

Der Kellner war nett aber nicht flexibel, wir wollten etwas vom Burger weglassen doch das wÃ¤re nicht mÃ¶glich. Als echte HRC fan die overal in de wereld waar het kan naar een HRC kan gaan , gaan we , zo ook hier op Tines Square weer in 2025 ( 2005 en 2017 ook) .stoelen zijn klaar ( gammel ) inrichting verder blijft gaaf zoals bijna elke HRC â€¦.

Bediening was voor het eerst echt minder . Minder in de klanten geÃ¯nteresseerd . Luisterde half hierdoor ging ook het eea mis bij ons als aan andere tafels . Had niet zoveel zin om te â€œwerkenâ€ zo leek het .

Ik reserveer altijd online ruim van tevoren . Wilde drie dagen tevoren de reservering aanpassen naar 6 personen ipv drie. Kon niet gaf het systeem aan. OkÃ© jammer maar prima . jammer maar helaas gingen we teleurgesteld terug naar ons hard rock hotel .

Ho messo 1 stella al cibo xchÃ¨ nn l'ho provato, quindi non posso valutarlo. Lo shop Ã¨ fighissimo cosÃ¬ come l'esterno. Cassiere un po' goffo e lento. Ovviamente abbiamo fatto shopping come in tutti gli hard rock cafÃ¨ che visitiamo. DovrÃ² tornare per cenare cosÃ¬ potrÃ² dare un contributo piÃ¹ dettagliato.

Me and my boyfriend came here on a gay date night last week and had a wonderful time together! We r from DE and drove up for dinner and a show. We both got burgers and we loved them! Cooked to perfection as well. We sat in a booth and had a great time together! The decor here is unlike any other hard rock I have ever been to. We sat at a booth because tables make u look low class and inferior and submissive. If you donâ€™t wanna get bullied and picked on by me and the frat boys u must sit in a booth. Me and the frat boys will look down on anyone Sitting in a table. Me and my boyfriend will definitely be back here again we had so much fun looking down upon other diners sitting at tables. This is an awesome LGBT friendly restaurant as well! Definitely come check this place out.

I was super impressed with the staff at the NYC location! We had 13 people (3 adults and 10 twelve year old Girl Scouts) and made 2 separate reservations. I did not request that we be sat near each other but someone noticed the last names on the reservations matched and they linked the two. We had to wait 15 minutes for our reservation but the girls were pumped to have time to shop. One of the girls was carrying around a cinch bag that had broken so she found a backpack in the store to buy. The girl at checkout realized why she was buying the bag and gave her a Hard Rock cinch bag instead.  Helping our Girl Scout rather than making a sale! What a great role model! Once we were seated we had 2 different waiters (which we were told about a head of time) who were fantastic! The gentleman had a table of 6 girls. He was great with them! Making jokes and just having fun. The waitress my table had was super attentive and kept up with refills before the girls had to ask. Never once did we feel like our large party of mostly kids was a bother. The food was also really good. The French fryâ€™s were perfection!

I recently visited the Hard Rock Cafe with a friend, and we had an incredible experience from start to finish. We were seated right away and greeted by our amazing waitress, Donneisha, who took great care of us throughout the night.

We kicked things off with drinks, and let me tell you â€” they did not disappoint. I went for their signature Hurricane cocktail and decided to order the large, since finishing it meant you got to keep the collectible glass. (Spoiler: challenge accepted and conquered!)

When the food arrived, everything looked and tasted phenomenal. We ordered a little bit of everything â€” the shareable buffalo wings, the margarita flatbread, and the fiery Diablo Burger. Every dish was served hot, fresh, and bursting with flavor.

Of course, no visit to Hard Rock is complete without taking in the iconic atmosphere. The walls are lined with legendary memorabilia from some of the greatest names in music, making the entire place feel like a museum for big kids and music lovers alike. I highly recommend walking around to see what pieces of rock history you can spot.

I canâ€™t wait to come back and explore even more of what Hard Rock has to offer â€” both on the plate and on the walls!

They sat us at the bar even though there was lots of empty tables. I dont  understand that idea, We were three people family, we ate dinner and drank something. If we are more comfortable, maybe I would drink one more beerâ€¦  But, nachos and burgers were good.

What a wonderful experience I had on my birthday and I was very very excited to receive a birthday badge by the very kind security guard on the front of the store. The food was absolutely divine. I was very excited to have a little birthday surprise sundae  they had arrived for me that was so sweet of the waiter.! Thank you so much for making my birthdayâœ¨ğŸ©·

It has been years since I've eaten at a Hard Rock Cafe, and maybe 20 years since I've been to the Times Square location. I was pleasantly surprised and happy to find that the quality of the food was quite good. I had the Surf and Turf burger. My son had the Messi Chicken Sandwich. I think he liked it because he devoured it. Mine was pretty awesome too. The French fries were some of the best I've had at a chain restaurant. Our server, Rick, was great - funny and very friendly!

It was about 11am when we were there so it wasn't crowded yet. We were able to walk around and look at the memorabilia without interrupting anyone's meal. As a Beatles fan, I was happy to see an area dedicated to the Fab 4.

After all these years, it was nice to see that the Hard Rock Cafe is still a great place to visit.
Visita veloce giusto quest volta il tempo di un caffÃ¨ comprare la maglietta ricordo hard rock foto e partenza. Ma comunque Ã¨ uno dei migliori hamburger .

It was exactly what I thought it would be, but portions were a touch small for the big prices.
I couldn't believe it was so quiet inside.
Kids' meal was great with a toy, colours, pizza, chips, and a drink.

We booked in advance to save disappointment as Times Square was crazy busy!
Great place for kids, loud, noisy, can have a good look around, fast food.
